entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add '--self-contained' and '--no-self-contained' options to `dotnet test` command #31066
  • Add support for RazorLangVersion 8 #31058

Closed

  • Wrong version number under "Installed Apps" #30993
  • dotnet list return code changed #30975
  • .NET 7 SDK's dotnet.exe change the attached terminal code page when its standard output is redirected #30170
  • TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #27642
  • Consistency for `os` and `arch` CLI argument names #30962
  • Whats the triage process here? #29960
  • Latest mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:7.0-alpine reporting vulnerable dependencies on trivy scan #31074
  • Improve error messages reported when a workload is missing #30230
  • Enable workloads on arm64 #27243
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix documentation link #31078
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Breaking Backport] Restore Console Encoding upon Exit #31077
    Area-CLI
  • Disable analyzers for dotnet-watch when running source-build. #31076
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #31060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test trying to reproduce the race in generating wrong file through enumerating files #31059
  • Refactor command line options parsing, add/improve imp of --launch-profile and --no-launch-profile options. #31054
    Area-Watch

Merged

  • Restore Encoding for the .NET SDK upon Exit #30963
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31052
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #31053
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tracking of the nuget cache and update to a flag zip list #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • edit: `applyPathes` -> `applyPatches` #30852
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2130881 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #31069
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add some more details on team triage #30574
    Area-NetSDK
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Create workloads enumerator lazily in dotnet-new hos #30773
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the Newtonsoft.Json to 13.0.1 #31023
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.203 #31038
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Area-NetSDK
  • 30784 dotnet info workload info #31007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Produce reference assembly when target is .NET Standard #30792
  • Blazor hosted #30908
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • fix displaying column when param is specified #31003
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
